mapper.select: SELECT pm.id, pm.work_cycle as workCycle, pm.agency_id as agencyId, oa.name as agencyName, pm.name, pm.type, pm.compile_issue_unit as compileIssueUnit, pm.count, pm.date, pm.remarks, pm.attachments FROM publicity_material pm LEFT JOIN org_agency oa ON pm.agency_id = oa.id WHERE oa.is_delete = 0 AND pm.id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE publicity_material SET count = count - #{count} WHERE id = #{id} AND count >= #{count}
UPDATE publicity_material SET count = count + #{count} WHERE id = #{id}
